Text: NABA Candidate MeetingPST PLEASE RESOND IF YOU ARE UNABLE TO ATTEND The purpose of this meeting is to review candidates that were interviewed at the conference and determine who to bring back Time frame is to have candidates in Houston for round interviews is within two weeks Your attendence at this meeting is very important Thanks Vanessa x

Updated NABA Preparations MeetingPST If you are scheduled to attend this conference and are unable to attend it is imperative that you send someone in your place Conference and interview schedules specific to the Enron team and conference shirts will be distributed at this time Please contact Meliza Evanson x or myself x if you have any questions See you there
